author: jkaputin
msg: Change the printing of error messages to use a more
compact format, similar to Xerces parser messages.

author: jkaputin
msg: Overloaded the reportError methods to add new methods
that take location, errorId and a message string
(rather than an array of message args).
Changed Throwable method args to Exception.

author: jkaputin
msg: Remove the fields baseURI, locURI, lineNo, ColNo and
added a field for ErrorLocator which now encapsulates
that location info. Also changed the Throwable arg
on two reportError methods to Exception instead
